game.gamename: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers (World 930911)
game.miscDetails: The ssf2 cpo image I found was very fuzzy. If you have a DEDICATED ssf2 cpo image please correct any mistakes I might have made. The labels to this game are very important as not only is it one of the very last dedicated capcom fighter cabs, but it's labels become the 'universal standard' for future capcom fighters.
